评论概述: Thin smooth material, not a sweatshirt
评论详情: This absolutely is not a sweatshirt.  Very thin, with a smooth feeling material both inside and out (which I hated the feel of).  I was looking for a soft, thick comfy sweatshirt.  This isn't is.  This is more of a long sleeve polyester tee.
it’s nice sweater even after washing still the same,I gonna bay more with different color.
Very Cute, gave it to my sister who is going to Paris in the spring

So I was very pleasantly surprised with this sweatshirt. First off, it is oversized and fits great. It is a little more heavy weight than I thought but not in a bad way. It has a nice little stretch to it and it breathes. The print on the front is well done and will not come off in the wash. I am so happy with this purchase.
This Sweatshirt is amazing, very nice quality sweatshirt material, not chessy thin. Very happy with this purchase, very comfy too.
Oversized and a nice sweatshirt. Soft and makes a great gift.
